subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Jan Ullrich, the 1997 Tour de France winner, has admitted for the first time that he received blood-doping treatment from the Spanish doctor Eufemiano Fuentes.
snippet: Jan Ullrich, the 1997 Tour de France winner, has admitted for the first time that he received blood-doping treatment from the Spanish doctor Eufemiano Fuentes.
